## Login

`POST cognito-idp.us-west-2.amazonaws.com`
*Request:*:
```json
{
    "AuthFlow": "USER_SRP_AUTH",
    "AuthParameters": {
        "SRP_A": "string",
        "USERNAME": "ventas.rebora@gmail.com"
    },
    "ClientId": "4je1v2kfou9e9plpv6vf0vmnll",
    "ClientMetadata": {}
}
```
*Response*:
```json
{
    "ChallengeName": "PASSWORD_VERIFIER",
    "ChallengeParameters": {
        "SALT": "string",
        "SECRET_BLOCK": "string",
        "SRP_B": "string",
        "USERNAME": "ventas.rebora@gmail.com",
        "USER_ID_FOR_SRP": "ventas.rebora@gmail.com"
    }
}
```

`POST cognito-idp.us-west-2.amazonaws.com`
#REQ:

    {

"ChallengeName": "PASSWORD_VERIFIER",

"ChallengeResponses": {

"PASSWORD_CLAIM_SECRET_BLOCK": "",

"PASSWORD_CLAIM_SIGNATURE": "4VIFyS7ldr732fYQwE2fN/oE+vZnU8MlnoTvOEc9hVA=",

"TIMESTAMP": "Fri Nov 10 18:59:35 UTC 2023",

"USERNAME": "ventas.rebora@gmail.com"

    },

"ClientId": "4je1v2kfou9e9plpv6vf0vmnll",

    }
